source:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Mogek the Marvelous is staring at two unevenly sized blocks of stone.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
バール・レス広場のお利口のモグエクは、冒険者を探していたようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_01<tab>Rocks of every shape and size have been arriving at the restoration site, and the Mogmenders overseeing the monument's reconstruction have not been at all shy about voicing their complaints to Mogek. Claiming that the melange of rocks has rendered all the shipments they received from the stonemasons next to worthless from a builder's standpoint, a flustered Mogek turns to you for help. Travel to Zenith and speak with the masonry moogle.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

モグエクから、石切のモーグリ族たちの指導を請け負ってほしいと頼まれた。白亜の宮殿にいる「石切のモーグリ族」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_02<tab>The lead stonemason is taken aback to learn the construction moogles had been receiving such an incongruous variety of rocks with each shipment. Deciding the best way to ensure the standardization of their product is to cut down the larger blocks to match the size of the smaller ones, he asks that you produce an item with which the masons will be able to do so. Synthesize stonemasonry supplies and see that they are delivered to the apprentice stonemasons.

※In the event you lose the materials or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with the masonry moogle.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_02<tab>石切のモーグリ族と話したところ、新米職人モーグリたちの見本となるような仕上げの技を見せてほしいと頼まれた。「<var 28 ((Item)) F23D8F01 /var>」をもとに「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D7501 /var>」を製作し、白亜の宮殿の「新米石切のモーグリ族」に納品しよう。

※「<var 28 ((Item)) F23D8F01 /var>」を失った場合は、石切のモーグリ族に話しかけましょう。材料を入手し、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_03<tab>The newest stonemasons gather around as you work and are impressed when you reveal your final product to them. Instilled with a renewed sense of motivation, they return to Asah to take another attempt at carving rocks.
target: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_03<tab>新米石切のモーグリ族に<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D7501 /var>を納品したところ、新米石切のモーグリ族たちはやる気を出して持ち場に戻っていった。アサー天空廊の「新米石切のモーグリ族」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_04<tab>The novice stonemasons present you with their latest attempt at producing a uniform set of stone blocks. Confident that they have improved, they ask that you deliver them to Mogek to receive his seal of approval.
target: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_04<tab>新米石切のモーグリ族と話したところ、作り方を見なおして製作したという「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C4301 /var>」を受け取った。バール・レス広場の「お利口のモグエク」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C4301 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_05<tab>Mogek is pleased to see the set of stones appear to be the exact same shape and size. He is certain even the construction moogles who had previously expressed their discontent will be appeased.
target: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SEQ_05<tab>モグエクに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C4301 /var>を渡した。この品質なら十分満足だとモグエクは喜んでいた。また品質に偏りが出てきたら、その際は新米石切のモーグリ族たちを指導してあげよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize stonemasonry supplies <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the stonemasonry supplies <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to the muzzing moogle)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエスト：<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D7501 /var>を製作)) ((新米石切のモーグリ族に<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D7501 /var>を納品)) /var>
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_TODO_02<tab>新米石切のモーグリ族と話す

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the blocks of stone to Mogek the Marvelous.
target: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_TODO_03<tab>お利口のモグエクに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C4301 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_000<tab>Thank the gods you're here! All <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((afternoon)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> the construction moogles have been pelting me with complaints regarding the shipments they've been receiving from the stonemasons.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_000<tab>お待ちしておりましたくぽ。
石切のモーグリ族たちに、石材を作ってもらっているのですが、
最近、質が均一じゃなくなっていて、困りものなのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_001<tab>It would appear that, while each of the stone blocks that arrive at the site have been polished to a shine, no two are the same! This has made it nearly impossible for the rocks to be stacked, much less used for construction.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_001<tab>そこで、冒険者さんにお願いがありますくぽ。
「白亜の宮殿」で作業をしている「石切のモーグリ族」たちを、
指導してやってほしいのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_002<tab>The masons need someone to guide them, and I can think of none better than the master <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>. Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, show the stonemasons of Zenith how sculpting is truly done!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_002<tab>それはもうモグジンにやったのと同じように、
ポンポンを引っこ抜く勢いで指導をお願いしますくぽ。
よろしくお願いしますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_010<tab>What is this!? The blocks we have been dispatching are not all uniform? Oh, this is not good, kupo! Not good at all!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_010<tab>なんだってくぽ！？
モグたちが仕上げた石材の品質に、バラつきがあるくぽ？
くぽぽ……それはよくないくぽ……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_011<tab>I don't understand how such a thing could happen... My masons have been working tirelessly, meticulously chipping away at their stones, even as their pom-poms droop with exhaustion.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_011<tab>モグたちは、壊れた遺跡から集めた古い石材を、
ザックリ削ってから、磨き上げて、再利用しているくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_012<tab>Unless... Oh, dear! Is it possible, that in their haste to begin production, they forgot to consult with one another? That would certainly account for the differing shapes and sizes.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_012<tab>もしかしたら、この仕上げで問題が生じているかもしれないくぽ。
それぞれのモーグリが、自分の基準で磨き上げるから、
仕上がりもバラバラになってしまうくぽ……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_013<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it seems Mogek was right to send you! We are in desperate need of your assistance.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_013<tab>そうだ、冒険者さんにお願いくぽ！
見本となるような仕上げの技を見せてもらえたら、
新米くんたちも、それを基準に仕事が進められるはずくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_014<tab>Perhaps if you were to produce a file, with which we could grind down some of our larger blocks, we will be able to standardize all of the rocks in our shipments!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_014<tab>金属製のヤスリで、
石材に最後の微調整をしてみてほしいくぽ。
冒険者さんの技術を、思う存分発揮してくださいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_015<tab>Perhaps if you were to produce a wooden mallet, which we could use with our chisels to pound down our larger blocks, we will be able to standardize all of the rocks in our shipments!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_015<tab>冒険者さんが得意とする素材で磨き上げて、
石材に最後の微調整をしてみてほしいくぽ。
冒険者さんの技術を、思う存分発揮してくださいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_016<tab>Perhaps if you were to produce an abrasive, with which we could use to grind down some of our larger blocks, we will be able to standardize all of the rocks in our shipments!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_016<tab>冒険者さん特製の研磨剤を作って、
石材に最後の微調整をしてみてほしいくぽ。
冒険者さんの技術を、思う存分発揮してくださいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_017<tab>I'll have my masons bring them for you, so if you find yourself running low on materials, don't hesitate to speak up, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_017<tab>材料はモグがいくらでも用意するから、安心するくぽ。
終わったら、「新米石切のモーグリ族」に見せてやってほしいくぽ。
よろしくお願いしますくぽー！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_018<tab>I am so glad this matter has been brought to my attention. It would seem we─ Ah! My apologies, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> for not noticing sooner. I shall have them brought to you immediately. You there, go and fetch the requested materials at once, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_018<tab>材料はモグがいくらでも用意するから、安心するくぽ。
終わったら、「新米石切のモーグリ族」に見せてやってほしいくぽ。
よろしくお願いしますくぽー！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_019<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you've been gifted with a touch the gods themselves would envy! My masons have been waiting with bated breath to gaze upon your finished work, and I'm certain they shall not be disappointed!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_019<tab>さすが冒険者さん、素晴らしい仕上げくぽ。
早く、「新米石切のモーグリ族」に見せてやってほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_020<tab>I can't see, kupo! I must move in closer to observe the master's movements, kupo!
target: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_020<tab>隅々まで、しっかり研磨するくぽ～！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_030<tab>We have come to look upon the master's work, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_030<tab>話は聞きましたくぽ、ご協力感謝しますくぽ！
冒険者さんの技術が、みっちり詰まった逸品はできましたくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_031<tab>Y-You are truly amazing─so swift and precise, kupo! I have never seen anything like it! How does one become such a great crafter?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_031<tab>す、す、すばらしい出来ですくぽ……！
いったいどうすれば、ここまで上手くなれますくぽ？
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_Q1_000_000<tab>どうしたら、こんなに上手くなれる？

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_A1_000_001<tab>One must always pay attention to the details.
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_032<tab>Your wise words have served to motivate us even further. We shall return to work and try again and again until we get it right!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_032<tab>なるほど……とても参考になりましたくぽ！
冒険者さんのお言葉を仲間にも伝えて、
この見本を見ながら、改めて作ってみますくぽ～！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_033<tab>While it will likely take a tremendous amount of time and practice to become as adept as you, we shall never give up, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_CRAFTSMOOGLE02300_000_033<tab>冒険者さんのような素晴らしい仕上げができるよう、
モグたちも鍛錬を積むくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_040<tab>Thank you, adventurer! With your help, we have finally created a set of three stone blocks that are the exact same size, kupo! We shall get started on the next ones, so please take these to Mogek for approval.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_040<tab>冒険者さんのお言葉を思い浮かべながら、
改めて作ってみましたくぽ。
これをモグエクに届けてほしいですくぽ、お願いしますくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_041<tab>I think we have seen much improvement, and it is all thanks to you, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_STONEMOOGLE02300_000_041<tab>冒険者さんのお言葉を思い浮かべながら、
改めて作ってみましたくぽ。
これをモグエクに届けてほしいですくぽ、お願いしますくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_050<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((afternoon)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Pray tell, how did the lessons go?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_050<tab>いかがでしたくぽ？
品質のバラつきの件ですが、どうにかなりそうですくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_051<tab>What wonderful news! While they certainly have their work cut out for them, I feel this is the last bit of trouble we'll be seeing from the stonemasons.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_051<tab>おぉ、この品質なら満足ですくぽ。
冒険者さんが指導してくださったおかげですくぽ。
ありがとうございましたくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_052<tab>Just look at these samples─they're absolutely magnificent! I'm certain even the construction moogles will be impressed by the precision with which they have been cut, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_MOGEK_000_052<tab>これでしばらくは、
質のいい石材が、安定して納品されるはずですくぽ。
また品質がブレてきたら、ご指導よろしくお願いしますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG303_02300_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>本クエストで製作した「NQアイテム」を所持しています。
このアイテムは、使用することはありません。
売却もできませんので、不用でしたら破棄してください。
